summary: The idyllic life of Tarzan and Jane is challenged by men on safari who come seeking ivory, and come seeking Jane as well.
cast: Johnny Weissmuller|Maureen O'Sullivan|Neil Hamilton|Paul Cavanagh|Forrester Harvey|Nathan Curry|George Barrows|Everett Brown|Ray Corrigan|Yola d'Avril|Paul Porcasi|Desmond Roberts|William Stack|Tanner
director: Directors: Cedric Gibbons, James C. McKay (uncredited) | 1 more credit »
title: Tarzán y su compañera
